longDesc: Puff the Fractal Dragon is here, contemplating a higher reality.
detailedDesc: Is that some type of differential curve involving some strange, and Is that some type of differential curve involving some strange, and unknown calculus that she seems to be made out of?

longDesc: A boring old clone is standing here.
detailedDesc: This clone is nothing to look at.  No, really, it is quite boring. This clone is nothing to look at.  No, really, it is quite boring.

longDesc: A strange humanoid is here.  How odd, its flesh seems to be falling off!
detailedDesc: This strange humanoid is moving rather slowly, and appears to be This strange humanoid is moving rather slowly, and appears to be a corpse, a walking corpse!  It must be a zombie or something of the sort.

longDesc: An amorphous shape is floating in the air.
detailedDesc: As you stare at this amorphous shape, it begins to appear to take As you stare at this amorphous shape, it begins to appear to take the shape of a cloud-like humanoid.

longDesc: An elemental is standing patiently here.
detailedDesc: This creature is the essence of the elements, and appears to be This creature is the essence of the elements, and appears to be waiting patiently for something to occur.
